quiz.q: She's been looking for a job ____ 3 months.
I've been looking forward to a holiday _____ ages.
I've been eating 5 oranges a day ____ I learned about the benefits of Vitamin C.
I've been trying to get through to their office _____ 3 hours!
She's been learning English _____ she arrived in Ireland.
He's been dreaming about being an astronaut ____ he was a kid.
I've been thinking about a career change ____ about 2 years.
The cat has been toying with that mouse ____ nearly an hour.
I've been sleeping much better ____ I gave up coffee.
